settings.question: Who can place an order through Brandoris?
settings.answer: Anyone with a valid passport can place an order

settings.question: How long should I wait?
settings.answer: Delivery of the order is carried out within 14 days. Due to the nature of international transportation, delivery time may be extended.

settings.question: Can I pay for the goods upon receipt?
settings.answer: We are not an online store and act as an agent between the client and the seller, purchasing goods individually for each client. In this regard, 100% prepayment is required.

settings.question: What’s included in the final price?
settings.answer: Product price, product search, additional packaging of fragile goods, customs clearance and door-to-door delivery are all included in the price we offer you. No additional charges

settings.question: How to ensure product authenticity?
settings.answer: We only purchase from official online stores, guaranteeing authenticity. When you submit a request to purchase a specific item from a particular store, we always ensure the source is reliable. If we cannot guarantee the store's reliability, we will suggest an alternative purchase source that has proven itself as a platform with original products

settings.question: How to pay for the order?
settings.answer: Payment can be made with any bank card from your country

settings.question: Can I track the shipment?
settings.answer: Yes, a tracking number will be sent to you once the item is dispatched

settings.question: What if the product doesn't suit me?
settings.answer: If the product is different from your order or defective, reject it and reach out to us for a solution. Keep in mind, returns for products that aren't defective but don't meet your expectations aren't possible through our service

settings.question: Can I cancel an order?
settings.answer: You can cancel an order before the product is purchased, and we will refund your money, deducting the cash-payment services fee. Once the product is purchased, cancellation is not possible

settings.question: Is the manufacturer's warranty applicable?
settings.answer: Yes, for warranty claims, contact the manufacturer directly

settings.question: For further inquiries, contact us at buyout@cdek.shopping

settings.subheading: For further inquiries, contact us at buyout@cdek.shopping

settings.text: For further inquiries, contact us here or mail us buyout@brandoris.mx
